CWEs: CWE-116: Improper Encoding or Escaping of Output
description:
The function escapeShellArg is vulnerable to command injection. It attempts to escape shell metacharacters, but it only escapes single quotes. Other shell metacharacters such as ;, &, |, $, ``, ", 
, , 	, \0, *, ?, [, <, >, ^, (, ), {, }, ~, and ! are not escaped. This allows an attacker to inject arbitrary shell commands, leading to command injection vulnerability.
